The Shuicheng Miluo Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Luoma, Shuicheng County, Liupanshui City, Guizhou Province

operators: Guizhou Water City Mining Co Ltd
owners: Guizhou Shuikuang Holding Group Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Guizhou Shuicheng Mining Co Ltd, which is a subsidiary of Guizhou Water City Mining Co Ltd.
